summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust at Deutsche Bank for the month of May 2019. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer and interest earned.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account had a beginning balance of $97,828.79.

events.description: An outgoing transfer of $97,828.79 was made to WMorgan Chase Bank.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $521.71 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 RFD Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $97,828.79 on May 1, 2019.
An outgoing transfer of $97,828.79 was made to WMorgan Chase Bank on May 10, 2019.
The account earned an interest payment of $521.71 on May 31, 2019.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2019, was $21.71.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during the statement period.
